Body:
"""Test with two islands"""
data = np.zeros((7, 9), dtype=np.int)
data[1, [1, 2, 3]] = 1
data[2, [1, 3, 6]] = 1
data[3, [1, 5, 6, 7]] = 1
data[(4), :] = data[(2), :]
data[(5), :] = data[(1), :]
ms = MarchingSquares(data)
if not np.all(ms.data == data):
    raise AssertionError()
perims = ms.do_march_all()
if not len(perims) == 2:
    raise AssertionError()
if not np.all(ms.data == data):
    raise AssertionError()
